title: Kateryna
Kaida
Hero.info:
My main design tools are curiosity, empathy and active listening.


 And here’s a little secret: I’m slightly obssessed with what I do

Description.title: Let’s get to know each other
Description.text:
Hi there! Glad to see you on my page. I’m a UI/UX designer with a year of commercial experience. And also a language learning geek and a proud owner of two boisterous cats.


 I transitioned to digital design from English teaching. This background has helped me develop even bigger passion for learning and sharing knowledge as well as given a huge boost to my communicative skills and a few hints on how people think and memorize stuff.


 If you ask me where I draw my inspiration from, it would be music, travelling and other people.

title: Kateryna
Kaida
Hero.info: Cześć! Jestem UI/UX designerem z Rzeszowa. Moim celem jest stworzenia lepszego świata za pomocą pięknego designu.
